Albert Topdjian 2017

About

    Job Status
      Co-Founder @ Processly and DzgnIO
      Product Developer @ Lexicon
  • Location
      Pittsburgh, PA

Hi there! My name is Albert but it’s pronounced Al-bear, the French way (the “t” is silent).

Lately my efforts and passion have been towards Co-founding my startup called Processly. I work with my amazing cofounders everyday to redefine how students learn and how teachers teach as we enter the digital age of learning.

My life journey has been complex and adventurous but here are some highlights:

  • - Graduated with a degree in Industrial Design from Carnegie Mellon University
  • - Have been mentored as an Innovation Scholar in the Center for Innovation and Entrepreneurship
  • - Is a soft-goods designer for Lexicon Design in Pittsburgh
  • - Worked with American Eagle Outfitters as a UX Designer

Other than my professional accomplishments, I love to cook, bike, windsurf, and play jazz music on any instrument that I can find.

The goal of this site is to keep track of projects, activities, and thoughts that I have done and to share it with you in hopes that you can learn something from them. If you have any questions and/or comments don’t hesitate to reach out through Linkedin or Twitter.
